Title: Hamlet A.D.D.
Writer: Andrew Swant (story), Bobby Ciraldo (story), William Shakespeare (play)
Actors: Bobby Ciraldo, Robert Richard Jorge, Andrew Swant, Dustin Diamond
Plot: Hamlet is an easily distracted prince who is challenged to kill his uncle Claudius by the ghost of his recently dead dad. This bizarre sci-fi comedy features live-action characters in a colorful cartoon world.
